definition: to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: Finally, a novel spatial truss mechanism model for the beam-wider-than-wall joint is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 最后还提出了梁筋直锚型节点受力的空间桁架模型。

sentences.english: A method is proposed for the inverse displacement analysis of the dual double-octahedral variable geometry truss manipulators.
sentences.chinese: 研究了双二重八面体变几何桁架机器人的逆位置分析。

sentences.english: Section 48 contains the auxiliary power unit(APU) and horizontal stabilizer truss.
sentences.chinese: 48部分包括辅助动力装置和水平安定面桁架。

sentences.english: As a result, the researches on Truss Type SRC members is fewer.
sentences.chinese: 所以，目前对桁架式SRC构件的研究很少。

sentences.english: The open network truss excellent load lighter.
sentences.chinese: 开网桁架是极好的负载较轻的地方。

sentences.english: The results show the combined roof trusses has a practical support effect in coal roadway.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明组合桁架锚杆对煤巷具有良好的支护效果。

sentences.english: Computation and analysis on hybrid steel structure of tubular truss-cable net;
sentences.chinese: 空间桁架拱支索网结构是一种新型空间混合结构体系。

sentences.english: Chanute invented the "strut-wire" braced structure that would be used in all biplanes of the future.
sentences.chinese: 夏尼特发明了适用于日后所有双翼机的空间桁架结构。

sentences.english: It was constructed from prefabricated wood trusses and pre-finished metal panels.
sentences.chinese: 整体结构使用预制木桁架和预粉刷的金属板材。

sentences.english: An optimization method for shape adjustment of perimeter-truss mesh antenna reflectors was put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种周边桁架式索网天线型面的快速调整方法。

sentences.english: The old Xinzha Bridge in Shanghai City is a steel truss bridge, 64.
sentences.chinese: 上海市老新闸桥为钢桁架桥，桥长64。

sentences.english: It had a wood-trussed clear span of over 25 meters (83 feet). It finally collapsed in the middle of the second century.
sentences.chinese: 在二世纪中期倒塌的它木桁架净跨超过25米。

sentences.english: Two types of portal cranes: truss type and cylinder type, are available.
sentences.chinese: 分为桁架式和圆筒式两种门架型式。

sentences.english: Trusses showed no major defects or damage at the time of inspection.
sentences.chinese: 桁架表明在检查时没有重大缺陷或损坏。

sentences.english: The thesis first makes a study on the design of staggered steel-timber truss.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先对错列钢木混合桁架进行设计研究。

sentences.english: The tube truss system of the roof structure and the connecting processing of high-low position are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 还介绍了屋盖管桁架结构及其高低部位的连接处理。

definition: a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
a boom (i.e. transverse beam for hanging objects)
to construct by hoisting ready-built components into place
to support/to bear the weight of (a building)
to sustain/to bear the weight (of the upper storeys in architecture)/load-bearing
